metadata.title: CVE-2015-7685 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI before 0.85.3 allows remote authenticated users to create super-adminaccounts by leveraging permissions to create a user and the _profiles_idparameter to front/user.form.php.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
